WebOrganizer.FileSupport

Class UserFileManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebOrganizer.FileSupport.UserFileManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserManagementInterface

    public class UserFileManagement
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserManagementInterface
    Class implementing UserManagementInterface. Responsible for accessing the file

      • checkUser

        public boolean checkUser(java.lang.String nick,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Overriden method for checking if the user is in the base by reading the file with users data
        Specified by:
        checkUser in interface UserManagementInterface
        Parameters:
        nick - name of the user to be checked
        password - password of the user to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the user is in the base, if not returns false
